
### a fork question  {.smaller}


```c
int main() {
    pid_t pid = fork();
    if (pid == 0) {
        printf("In child\n");
    } else {
        printf("Child %d\n", pid);
    }
    printf("Done!\n");
}

```
Exercise: Suppose the pid of the parent process is <code>99</code> and child is <code>100</code>. Give <em>two</em> possible outputs. (Assume no crashes, etc.)
